subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Given the Nets’ history, it is difficult to comprehend that Barclays is paying exactly what Citicorp committed in November for the right for 20 years to name the Mets’ new stadium.
snippet: Given the Nets’ history, it is difficult to comprehend that Barclays is paying exactly what Citicorp committed in November for the right for 20 years to name the Mets’ new stadium.
